name: CursedExpedition-TheJungleofLostSouls
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cursed expedition
des: As the leader of an archaeological expedition, you must navigate a cursed jungle in search of a mythical lost city. Make tough decisions to ensure your crew’s survival, manage resources, and deal with supernatural forces lurking within the jungle. Can you uncover the truth behind the curse and make it out alive? Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
